name: Call of Cash - Plinko Master
description:
Real Cash, 100% Free! Easy to Win, Today is Your Lucky Day!

Call of Cash is a new 3D Plinko game. Tap the screen to start an exciting and happy journey.
Tap the screen to drop the ball to win rewards, the jackpot is waiting for you!
Download Call of Cash now! Enjoy the luck and rewards brought by every collision!

Game features:

- Simple: touch the screen to throw the balls, blast blocks to get coin. redeem coins to real cash!
-Exciting: continuous pitching, unlimited collisions, super rewards.
-Slots: go through blocks, Enter the ring, spin the slot, and win the jackpot!
-Competition: compete with the other players in the leaderboard to win gift card everyday!
-Scratch: get surprise scratch cards, scratch and win surprise rewards!

*This game does not cost any real money.
*Playing this game does not imply future success in "Real Money Gambling".
*Apple does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Call of Cash.
